attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent I feel like I must speak out on the proposed fee increases.
While over 40% of adults have considered adopting a child, very few of those
families will move forward and actually adopt. Part of the reason is the expense.
We had to take out a second mortgage and cash out our retirement accounts to
bring out twin sons home from Korea in 2005.

Why add expenses (an average of 66% in increases) in fees to this degree? I
believe that this will be a huge burden to families who simply want to provide a
loving, stable home to a child.

I ask you to please reconsider these rate hikes that will affect so many honest,
hard working American families.

Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Michelle Dowd
